meta: The marks above vowels indicate tone and the length of the vowel. đ and sl are consonants.
train: I was about to continue to eat it.
Do I truly want to go?
I don’t have to eat it.
I did it like that just now.
Cáu vưhn nhahng bô sahm tảhng hẻht hơn.
I also continue to build the house alone.
Mưhn chơng ca cháhn fải khải
Then she truly was about to have to sell it.
Mưhn náhc-thày chơng bô sahm kíhn.
Then she also just previously ate it.
You wanted to go alone just previously.
test: Mưhn bô sạhm mi slơng hẻht hơn mi?
Don't I have to eat it alone like that just now?
Mưhn ngám bô sạhm páy hơn.
Mưhn ngám bô sạhm páy hơn đày đến.
Cáu mi slơng kíhn bô sạhm hẻht hơn đến đày.
I wasn’t about to eat it just previously.
Cáu mi slơng kíhn bô sạhm páy hơn đến đày.
She didn’t have to eat it alone like that just now.
The house truly can’t eat you.
Cháhn mưhn slơng tảhng páy hơn đến?
Then were you also about to go just previously?
